name: Hubot + IRC on Heroku
description: Deploy Hubot with IRC adaptor to Heroku

HUBOT_IRC_SERVER.description: The IRC server you want to connect to.

HUBOT_IRC_ROOMS.description: Comma separated list of the IRC channels hubot should join.

HUBOT_IRC_NICK.description: The nick you want your hubot to join with. If omitted it will default to the name of your hubot.
